img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game set in a snowy, mountainous environment. A character is seen crouching behind a rock, surrounded by a large, glowing, and crackling energy sphere. The sphere is emitting bright blue and white light, suggesting some form of magical or supernatural barrier or attack. The character appears to be wearing armor and has glowing red elements on their arms. The game's interface is visible, showing health and energy bars, along with various icons indicating abilities or items that can be used. The name "Kang Jin-Sa" is displayed at the bottom, possibly indicating the character's name or the name of a boss or enemy.
